title: Hour 2 -  Sam Smith (05-12-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 -  Sam Smith (05-12-20)
description:
Writer of the book Jordan Rule Sam Smith tells Dan that one Jordan Rule was that is was mandatory to come in and see the trainer when players got sick; but when Michael got sick the trainers went to see Michael at his house.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
